name: Untitled Hovercar Game
description:
Untitled Hovercar Game: a game in which you drive a pick-up hovercar, triying your best to deliver a box to the objective without letting it fall! (the box is propely secured to the back of your veichle of course! ;D)

  • Complete all the levels to obtain a cool prize!
  • 6 levels
  • Physically based veichle movement
  • Retro/low res style (which totally isn't made to hide my atrocious 3D modeling skills)
  • Cool prize if you complete all the levels!
  • Have I mentioned there is a cool prize if you complete the game?
  • Oh yeah I was about to forget it, there is a C O O L  P R I Z E  I F  Y O U  C O M P L E T E  T H E  G A M E

You can play this game with mouse and keyboard too, but if you have a controller I highly recommend you using it
